SEARCH
Package Service

Class BookInventory

java.lang.Object
Service.BookInventory
public class BookInventory extends Object
Singleton class that manages book inventory and notifies observers when a book is returned.

    • getInstance

      public static BookInventory getInstance()

      Returns:
      the BookInventory instance

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(BookObserver observer)
      Adds an observer to be notified when a book is returned.

    • notifyBookReturned

      public void notifyBookReturned(String isbn)
      Notifies all observers that a book with the given ISBN has been returned. Clears the observer list after notification.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the returned book
